name: Man of Trash
description:
Level Design, Sprites, Story: Erik Bachlinger

Music, SFX, Story: Noah Rayburn

Programmers: Oscar Herzog, Daniel Lee

He's lived in darkness his whole life and now that he's just turned 40 he doesn't have many years left. Follow him on his journey to see the sun with his very own eyes, collecting pieces of garbage to replace his limbs on the way to help him climb. A toaster for those pesky birds, a leaf blower for some quick dashes, and an accordion for a double jump. Will he make it out and see the sun, or will he just become the Man of Trash?
